content.detailedDescription: I was driving along greenbriar parkway around 16:00 when i noticed this square metallic object in the distance crossing over greenbriar parkway from the west. it was moving fast and as i approached it was gone.
content.summary: Square shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I and three others at calabash n.C.,saw two orange lights light up individually then go off. then three orange lights that did the same. we then counted nine star like objects fly around like helicopters but the blinking was irregular. they would appear to change direction very quickly or stop blinking and reappear very far away from where they last blinked. then form up to move sw toward ash. lost sight of them after they went over the tree line. i hope some one caught it on video.
content.summary: Orange objects then star like objects in the same night. calabash n.C.

content.detailedDescription: Was relaxing in hot tub a bright light caught my attention ,it seemed to appear from nowhere.It almost looked like 3 lights connected bright white .It looked horizontal then appeared to flip vertically .Really thought eyes were playing tricks on me full moon just off to its right and but after about 10 minutes it just completely and suddenly vanished then within seconds i saw atleast five aircraft cross patterns in the area i saw it .Just wondering if anyone else saw anything similar in swfl .
content.summary: Bright star like light seemed to flip

content.detailedDescription:
Thursday 12/19/13 left work at approximately 5:54 pm, came out of building which faces towards the river (north).  sky was clear, could see stars, no precipitation, it was dark.

immediately noticed four lights traveling across the sky, from the north heading east or southeast, and gaining altitude.  the first 3 lights were in a triangle formation and the 4th light traveled behind the triangle.  there was no noise.  all 4 lights kept the same distance from each other.  (i see military jets taking off a mile from the airport and these lights were travelling at perhaps a slower speed, and perhaps just a bit lesser altitude gain.)  i took a couple of still pictures (17:54:47 & 17:55:01) and then a video at 17:54:48.  one of the still shots shows a light, and the video shows the 4 lights (triangle and trailing light).

could not make out any object, only could see the lights.

i then witnessed light after light come off the horizon from the north and travel the same pattern, the same speed, probably about 12 more lights total.  some came off the horizon at a constant rate, i would guess they were about 30 seconds apart from each other and seemed to be equidistant from each other coming one-by-one. others came out perhaps at a 45 or 60 second interval.  all lights traveled at a constant speed, at the same speed as the other lights, and all traveled on the same linear path and seemed to eventually disappear.  i would estimate it took about 75 to 90 seconds from the time it came from the horizon until it fully disappeared.  another employee was walking to his car and i engaged him pointing out the lights.  he stated that he did not see the triangle formation, but saw about 6 of the lights and noted it was odd there was no noise.   i tracked one light as far as i could and it just got smaller and smaller, further away, then went out of sight like you would track a helium balloon.  at several points i observed what appeared to be a normal jet passenger plane, flashing light, much higher in the sky, and i could hear the jet eventually.  then there were no more lights travelling across the sky and i left the area.

the lights were odd compared to aircraft that i am aware of as they were constantly on, and flickered just a bit but did not blink.  the lights were the same intensity from the time they came out of the horizon thru the time they went past and outwards, and gradually weakened in size and intensity as they went out of view.  i thought this odd as the lights seemed to be multidirectional, not like a car/plan that you see the light as it comes towards you but perhaps a different light as you see the tail end of it. 

note - have worked at this location for over 10 years and have not noticed any similar activity or similar flight path.
content.summary: Triangle lights followed by about 12 lights. no noise.

content.detailedDescription: Orange spheres only appeared twice for a couple of seconds and 6 star like objects lasted 15 minutes over ocean star like came over land headed sw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 orange sphere and 4 to 6 starlike

content.detailedDescription: 3 of us out looking at hale bopp comet when we observed 2 light yellow, glowing,  diamond shaped objects. as they moved closer overhead the color transitioned to orange then red overhead. we were in a valley running s to n which was the same path as the objects. we had a clear view from s horizon to n horizon. based on planes we saw in the area i would say that they were about 1000 ft altitude. as they passed directly overhead there was no sound. as they passed further away they transitioned back to orange then to light yellow. it took approximately 5 seconds for the objects to pass from horizon to horizon. after the stun of what we saw wore off we asked each other if we all saw the same thing. we did. have never reported before for fear of being labeled crazy.
content.summary: 3 of us observed over southern horizon 2 light yellow diamond shaped objects moving faster than anything ver seen. changed color to orange then when overhead to bright red. as they moved n they changed color again to orange then finally back to light yell

content.detailedDescription: i was headed south on hwy 89, north of paulden. about the area of drake rd i noticed a couple of bright orange lights to my right. i slowed to look, and saw another appear...It just turned on, for lack of better terminology. as the fourth or fifth lit up, the first blacked out. they maintained a straight line, but did not seem to be moving at all. if i had to guess, i would say they were probably three to four miles out, but hard to say. there were high clouds, but thin and pretty bright with the moon full. good visibility. the reception on my radio seemed to be slightly effected, but not much. i was startled by two jets passing over me, appearing to be headed towards the lights. they were very low, approximately one hundred feet! as the terrain changed, i lost sight of all lights and the two jets. the jets appeared to be military.
content.summary: 4-5 lights appeared inndistance, above tree line. blinked on, then off in succesion.

content.detailedDescription: I just stepped outside (backyard) for a breath of air with my dog. the sound of a jet passing overhead caught my attention and i looked up. as i followed the jet's path for a few seconds my eyes were drawn to a very, very shiny object just a few degrees to the right of the now passed jet. this object almost seemed stationary at first, then i noticed it was moving ever so slowly from n.E. to n.W.. i immediately ran in the house to tell my sister and our roommate to come out and verify this object. (i had seen a similar object over our desert area last summer and it made a couple 90 degree turns, i didn't know what it was either but i had no witnesses, and i think those of who i mentioned it to thought i was "just seeing things"...That is why i made it a point to get a witness this time) anyway, the object was still visible and my sister and roommate saw it and asked, "what is it?" i said, "my point exactly" then my neighbor and his daughter happened to come out of their house, so i hollered at them to come over. i pointed up to this object and they saw it too, and asked what did i suppose it was. next my brother (who lives next door pulls up in his truck and asks us what are we all looking at. then he too saw it. he's quite the skeptic and said it was probably one of those 'mylar' balloons. i then said, "look at the clouds, they are moving with the upper winds in the opposite direction, if it was a balloon it would be going with the wind and the clouds." he then said, "well must be a ufo then." we watched this for about 15 more minutes until the clouds completely overtook our vision of it. everyone went back to doing what they were doing. about an hour later i came back out and noticed the clouds had parted leaving areas of blue sky. and much to my surprise i saw the object again, and it was back to almost the point where i first saw it! still very bright (about the size of venus on a good clear evening) i watched it move again from ne to almost overhead when the cloud cover really got thick and i lost sight of it again. i am a retired postal worker (letter carrier) and spend alot of time stargazing at night from my elevated pool deck. i know the difference between stars, some planets, shooting stars, satellites, etc.. i spent 4 years in the navy and spent many an hour on watch out at sea at night describing anything that moved. i have always believed in intelligent life outside our solar system and i have read over a dozen books on the subject. but i do know what i saw (along with 5 witnesses) and i don't think it was an earthly craft, unless it was a very new and secret airship our military is testing. i know that northeast of my location here some couple hundred miles is area 51. well, that is my story. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Bright round object slowly traversed the daytime sky occasionally disappearing behind small puffy clouds. it was moving the opposite direction of the wind current.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading south on in-5, was about 10 miles from huntington . it was during the night, around 10 pm or so. out of the corner of my eye i notice movement directly north of me in the sky; a green orb descending from the sky, traveling south and parallel with the road.

from the time i noticed it, it only took two or three seconds for the object to descend from the sky and make it to ground-level. the object fly over the house that was on the east side of the road that i happened to be driving by at the time, descend and land not even 10 ft from the back door. it made a distinct, intelligent path, not free-floating and couldn't have been bigger than a golf ball. the house in question was in the middle of a farm field, as if the homeowners rented/bought the property off of the farmer as is common practice around here, and also was only a good 30-40 ft from the road.

the field itself looked as if the farmer didn't use it during the winter because there was tall grass growing sporadically on it. the orb had apparently landed in the midst of a patch of the grass, because the light the orb gave off illuminated grass in close proximity, as if it wasn't reflecting some source of light but glowing in itself. out of anything in the whole experience that's what stands out in my mind the most. after it landed, it only remained for half a second before it just seemed to disappear.


as a personal note, i found it extremely disturbing how close the object landed to the house (right next to the backdoor of all places), and still get goosebumps every time i recall the incident.
content.summary: Green orb lands

content.detailedDescription:
Driving s./sw on salinas hwy.   pulled over on shoulder of road to observe the beautiful vibrant reddish clouds against powder blue sky at sunset.    exited vehicle for an uninpeded
view of sky.    took two(2) pictures w/i-phone 5g as well as brief video of the unfolding colors 
on cumulus clouds.    upon returning home and checking the photos out,  i played around with the zoom feature to frame certain cloud features and colors.    surprised to discover object slightly right of top of picture frame.   video portion of sky taken not more than 5 min. later 100yards further s. ( exactly 20yds into monterey county from san benito county line).
in recent years i have observed other out of the ordinary  objects in the sky.   comment all you'd like  as to my lack of optical references or cerebral superiority compared to your worldly
knowledge and experience,  chances are that you may actually be correct for once.   ( hey ufo's over gilroy, you still looking up? ).    i'll upload my pics and video as well as my zoomed pictures i have.    just a thought about our search for intelligent life out there.......Maybe they are finding things as difficult as we are???
content.summary: Snail shell appearance

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying down watching airplanes fly by my window. i saw one fly by, then shortly afterwards something else flew by. it looked like another airplane at first, but it was dark and i could only see the lights. their were three lights, two white in the front one red in the back. they made a triangular shape two in front, one in back. before it left view of my window, it quickly and abruptly turned around and flew in the other direction. the turn was not something a plane could do that quickly and easily. then it immediately plunged downwards. at this point it became one solid red light, then started strobing white light. then all the lights went out and there was nom more sign of it. the whole time i felt a sense of shock, awe, terror, and danger. then it left and i felt fine. also the entire time i saw it i heard a low, deep, humming.

at exactly 5:15 pm cet on the same day, with the exact same conditions and descriptions, i saw the same craft, fly by then stop. it stayed their for 10 seconds then then the lights went out and that was the last i saw of it.
content.summary: It followed a plane then started bugging out.

content.detailedDescription: I recvd a call from a friend telling me to run outside my apt complex when i noticed 30 craft in the sky. i ran to a police officer and a security guard watching the event. when i was talking to them they appeared to be frightened and i watched these 30 lights craft hang in the area for approx what seemed to b 20 mins. then they dispersed faster then any craft i have ever seen in different directions. 2 or 3 of them returned for a few seconds and disappeared.
content.summary: Approx. 30 craft hovered and then dispersed in different directions

content.detailedDescription:
My grandaughter (19) was alone driving on ferrell road near tornado, wv.  triangular  football field in size ufo with  lights hovered over a nearby field.  it moved around, back and forth and make a loud pulsating humming sound.  

it glowed underneath.  as cars stopped to look, it turned of lights (multicolored) and became invisible.  soon after cars began to move, lights came back on.  it abruptly disappeared and she went to a friend's house about 3 miles away.  she and her friends saw it again about a mile away. this time everything on ground lighted intincely. she called to tell me about it.  this happened about 9:40 pm  this evening 12/18/2013
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Trave;ing ferrell road and saw it hovering over field ; when cars began to stop it turned lights off and was invisible.  turned lights on agail after we (cars) began to move.  drove 2-3 miles and saw it again on strawberry road near st. albans lightnagain

content.detailedDescription: I was just parked my vehicle in my parking lot in bethlehem pa approximately 8 pm when we looked up and seen a row of orange bright lights. just hovering the sky then after maybe a minute or so they flew away one by one very fast.. and disappeared..
content.summary: Don't know what it was never seen this before

content.detailedDescription: Worked late shift in town. got off at approx. 1 a.M., had a twenty minute drive home. at approx. a quarter of a mile from the house, on a dirt/gravel road (we lived in the country on a seven acre farm), there were no street lights and i noticed a glowing light from the right rear window as i traveled south. it pulled up even with my front passenger window over the treetops and kept pace with my car - i was traveling about 25 mph as there are a lot of deer out and i had hit and killed one the year before. it frightened me a little as i didn't want to be abducted, and my first and only thought was that this was definitely an extra-terrestrial ufo. as i approached my driveway it veered suddenly to the right (southeast), and the trees blocked me from seeing it any further so i thought it had flown off completely. i went into the house where my husband and daughter were sleeping and fixed a sandwich (with my work schedule this was my supper), got ready for bed and slept.  a while later i woke up, but nothing specific had wakened me, except that i noticed there was total silence outside. usually some of the farm animals made noises through the night, or dogs would bark, but this didn't feel like a normal silence. i was uneasy. i got up and looked out the window. there was only a slight breeze, but it was a little cool outside. my husband was in a deep sleep and i didn't wake him. i checked on my daughter whose room was across the hall from ours, and she too was sleeping. i went down the hall to the kitchen and didn't turn the light on as the moonlight shining in was very bright and i could see clearly. we had glass french doors leading to the back deck and two large windows in the kitchen, so i could see very clearly. i got a drink of water and was standing in front of the sink looking out the window and could see the horses in the paddock behind our house and counted them to be sure they were all there and hadn't gotten in the neighbors pasture with his cows. a movent caught my eye to the right, where i had hung out my grandmothers quilt to freshen it, and standing next to the quilt, with its shoulder pushing a bulge in it, was something i can only describe as a grey alien. it/he was approx. 3 1/2 feet tall. wearing no clothes, it looked toward the barn and then the horses, then looked directly at me. i remember setting my glass down and staring at it for a few seconds, and i thought (my only experience with e.T.S being from the movie or reading  stories of abductions here and there - and not believing them either), look at the clock to see if any time passes can't be accounted for. the clock said 3:07. i turned back and thought, well i'm not going outside with it there, so maybe i'll try talking to it in my head. i said "hello, my name is %%^&, and if you can hear me or understand what i'm saying, could you please raise your right hand. it blinked and raised its right hand, bent at the elbot, up to its shoulder, palm out. i don't remember how many fingers it had, but as he put his hand back to his side i noticed how long his arms and fingers were, much longer than ours. his head was larger, not in proportion to his body, and i thought how tiny his neck was to hold up such a big head. his shoulders were thin and his chest not well developed with muscle. he had no nipples that i can remember. his hips were very slender, and his legs as thin as his arms, and his feet seemed to me to be big for his leg size. he had a silvery pale bluish cast to his skin, but the mook could easily have washed or shaded any color, so i can't say for sure what his coloring was. his eyes were slanted at an upward angle and weren't exactly almond but more so than round. pure black, but i got no sense of evil or threat or fear by his being there. no hair covered him anywhere, and it/he had no genitalia that i could see, and was def. not female looking anywhere either. somehow i just sensed it was ok with me thinking of it as a "he", as if it made no difference one way or another to him. i next thought to him, i don't know why you are here, but i am sad to tell you can't let you in, i have to protect my family, especially my little girl, and that means if you try to come in or take me or them or do anything like that, you may be able to do it but i'll fight you and either i or you will get hurt. i wish i could come out and talk to you (and i was a little afraid, but i can't take that chance with my family. (i never thought it odd that he never actually talked back to me with words, it was more communication with emotion from him.) maybe you could come back in the future and we can talk, but not now. he looked down for a second, and his little mouth moved a tiny bit, and i got the feeling he was sad too, and sad that he probably wouldn't be back (that this was my one and only opportunity), and he took a step back and was hidden from me by the quilt. i stepped out onto the deck to see if he was still there, then tried to see over the quilt, and couldn't see anything. i went back into the house, and thought this is so strange, no one is going to believe me. i looked at the clock and the time showed 3:25. our entire mental conversation had taken what seemed to be about three minutes or less. i couldn't decide if i was wrong and it had taken longer than i thought, or if there was "missing" time. but i was quite relaxed and went back to bed, and fell into a nice deep sleep. the next morning i remember first thing thinking i need to get some paper and write everything down, but needed to get my daughter up and ready for school. her dad had already gone in to work. i remember thinking as i drove her in to school to be sure to remember to write it all down. then after i got home from dropping her off it was no longer in my head that it had happened at all. just a year ago something jogged my memory and it all came back as sharply as if it had happened the night before, and i haven't forgotten any of it. then i started searching online for ufo info, and after everything i've been researching, i decided to tell someone. i told my brother and he didn't say anything except "ok". (how strange). then i found the mufon site and decided to report it. i have had some other strange experiences as well throughout my life, but have no clue what it all means, or who to contact to sort it all out, and this at least i can make a little sense of, so decided it was time to report it. anyway, thats what happened, and it still amazes and puzzles me. what did he want, and after reading other encounters, if there was no abduction, why was he there? i never got any feeling of danger or threat from him, and to this day am sad i wasn't able to go outside and try to learn more about him. he has never come back, but if he did, now i'd go outside and try to talk to and learn about him.
content.summary: Oval, domed, glowing and rotating lights - object "glowed" overall from lights

content.detailedDescription: It has been cold outside for several days. one night i was walking outside to the garage and looked up at how clear and pretty the sky was. i saw an odd looking arrow shaped object brilliant in the sky, that i'd never seen before. at first i thought it was a satellite and dismissed it. dec. 2nd i went out to walk around the yard while letting the dogs run and do their thing and the object was there again, a little further sw than the night before. it was arrow shaped at the top with long tail, looked as if made up of many separate orbs of brilliant white lights with slight golden tint, at bottom of tail was a short line of orbs pointing upward at 45 degree angle. object would seem to turn and tail sometimes shorten, and it seemed to rotate slowly as it hovered. distance hard to guess but possibly at same altitude as airplane flight distances. hovered for 15 min. then started to move off further sw for a few seconds before completely disappearing. this has been going on every night since dec. 2nd. sometimes object is closer and the last three nights there have been 3-5 similar objects at different distances in the sky. one night the objects were accompanied by three orbs which formed a triangle. they blinked back and forth as if communicating and then moved closer to one of the larger arrow objects, which then began to flash a red orb from the point of the "arrow" at the top.  one of the orbs then "zoomed" across the sky to the southeast and suddenly disappeared.  night before last several objects in the sky again, scattered from the southeast to the southwest. two of these objects started flashing their topmost orb back and forth as if talking to each other - while doing so the points or top orbs turned red while flashing. when they finished the smaller of the two objects (or more distant object), suddenly disappeared. last night there were 5 objects in the sky, and this was at approx. 705pm. suddenly there were three black helicopters zooming through the sky with red lights flashing on them, (and which i'd never seen the helicopters use at night before) toward one of the more distant arrow objects. the arrow disappeared and i did not see the helicopters the rest of the night. not unusual for the house to be buzzed with black helicopters as ft. riley is south of us and they fly overhead fairly regularly, enough for us to recognize them. the only 2 nights i have not seen these strange objects was when there were extremely heavy rain or snow clouds overhead and nothing could be seen through them. approx. two nights ago an airplane flew overhead and it was further out than the objects. they have  shown up sometimes as early as 5:30, sometimes after 7pm, occasionally 1, 2,  and 3a.M. as far as feeling and/or reactions, i was rather excited and elated at seeing them, and hoping i wasn't hallucinating. i went the first night and got my family to come out and look and confirm i wasn't seeing things and they said they were seeing what i was seeing. i say excited and elated at seeing them because i believe we have been visited by ufos/ebes for some time and the government is keeping it secret. it's time they quit lying to the public and tell us the truth. i would be curious about the visitors and would like to know the truth, even if it was not good news, (i.E. if they are not here for our well-being), but that's not up to the government to decide, we have a right to know.
content.summary: Hovered in sky, occas. turning, diminished slowly in sz and suddenly disappeared.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i-29 in nw missouri i was just south of the farris air strip in faucett, mo. there was low cloud cover throughout the area but bright considering. i observed a large( football field size)craft heading in a se direction move between two clouds the craft profile is all i saw. it was taller than say a 18 wheeler but it was a very short period of time so i can not be more specific on height. it was moving at roughly 60 mph maybe a bit more but less than 120 mph. it had no visible wings or slopes to the structure.It passed back into full cloud cover before i could even slow down to get a better look. i was dumbfounded and later dismissed it as nothing until i heard about another report in neighboring illinois that appears to have taken place half a day later. so i thought i would share this little bit of info in case anybody else dismissed it as a trick of the eye.
content.summary: Saw profile of large craft passing between clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
As my daughter and i were pulling out of the driveway to go to the store,  i observed a brilliant pulsating white light just above the horizon through the back window of my car.  i pointed it out to my daughter and she confirmed she saw it too and said it was probably an airplane. we pulled onto the road facing east and sat there watching it flicker and dart in ways that proved to be it was not an airplane, and i watched it ascend upward at a slight angle over the trees and descended in front of them towards us. i backed back into my driveway and turned to face west to try to head towards the highway in the direction that the light seemed to be headed so we could get a better look at it, but by the time we had turned the car around, we realized that it was no more than 100' from us and we watched it fly directly overhead, so we followed it due east for almost a quarter mile towards the woods on the road and lost it just over the trees. we never saw it go any higher than that, but we turned the car back around at the edge of the woods, facing east again, and in the half minute it took us to get back to the driveway, it came back from over the trees from the next field down, like it had made a giant loop and it began following us from the field to our north. we lost sight of it from the s-curves on our road, but when we got to the t at the end of the road and turned right, i looked back and saw it floating about 8 to 10 feet above the road we turned off of, following our path.  i lost it again behind a barn and then seconds later my daughter said she could see it directly above the back window, which was just out of my field of vision, and we were coming up to a gas station so i pulled in there and she said she blinked and it disappeared, so i jumped out of the car to look for it but it was gone. 
we continued on to the store,  but i felt so weird and distracted and afraid that it would be waiting for us to follow us back home, so we went to another store and just before we went inside, we saw the light again, flashing and dancing around to the east above the highway! 
i got out my phone to try to take a video of it but as soon as i hit record, it vanished again. 
we went inside, and i had my boyfriend come and escort us home in case we saw it again.
content.summary: Observed "aware" flashing and pulsating lights with my 6-year-old.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car around 7:54 12/17/13 when my friend said look at all those aliens. then i looked and seen a whole swarm of what looked like 45- 60 stars at first then they stopped and stated flickering and clustered together then spread out and paused for about 10 minutes. after the helicopters came out clouds  started forming in front of these space crafts then they shot of into space. i knew these were craft from else where stars and meteors dont move like these did.
content.summary: 45- 60 objects soared though sky from ne direction  headed in sw direction then paused and vanished

content.detailedDescription: Watching t.V in my livingroom and out of the corner of my eye i saw a big white light, at first i thought it was a falling star but it got bigger turned into a bright green color and fell straight out of the sky and disappeared behind the treeline.
content.summary: Bright big green light falling at rapid speed out of the sky and dissapeared behind the treeline

content.detailedDescription: Saw what looked like the landing lights of a passenger jet. but the light suddenly dropped straight down over the airport and hovered. it held its elevation and moved slowly to the west and hovered again. i tooked a night vision photo with my telescope (attached) and a short movie which did not turn out. then as a passenger jet approached from the east it took off to the south and dissapeared. the ufo was about 3 times bigger than the plane.
content.summary: Ufo over edmonton international airport

content.detailedDescription:
the light was first observed by the person in the passenger's seat who pointed it out to us. as a light or object flying in the dark distance is uncertain  in the dark, but it was over the hill to the right and coming toward the highway, maybe about 1,500 to 1,000 feet up and about 2,000 feet away. it was approaching the highway and coming toward us, crossing our vision.
   something about this made it look strange, and out of the ordinary, including its movement, but nothing glaring about it said it could not be a plane at first, we could see no strobes flashing and it was not bright enough for a landing light. planes come in to land at gnoss field but not this far out or from this direction and contrary to the landing pattern. 
   it was off to the center right of the windshield, and lit a red orange. my first impression was that it looked like a landing light, but it was red-orange instead of a brilliant white. my next thought was possibly a helicopter. we could see it clearly. at first it looked like a solid light. after a short time, i began to see that it seemed to glow brighter and then fade. eventually it began pulsing. i started counting the pulses, and found they were about 1 second intervals. a strobe flashes at this rate, but it flashed, bright and on an off, on and off. this was a distinct pulsing glow and it would sometimes get mush brighter and sometimes it went dimmer, but did not go out - bright, dim, bright, dim. 

   it looked immediately strange, it moved from the right slowly to the left in a way only a helicopter might but as it crossed our vision, still no strobes. it crossed the windshield and over the highway, loosing altitude, to go over the petaluma wetlands. - 


738-1604 





12/9/13,  about 6:42pm, and dark out. clear sky, stars visible, highway traffic was light.    we had just left petaluma and were away from the towns lights. we were 3 people, monday, dec 9th, in a honda odesy driving south on hwy 101 at night, about 6:42pm. - for the first sighting: i was in the seat behind the driver, who was my mother. all 3 of us saw this, but i had the longest viewing.

****
    a second sighting: (involving 2 flying objects or lights) i will report this in a separate report, as mufon has no way to report multiple sightings together - a few days later we saw 2, low flying, nearly identical lights, right over the city of petaluma. it started when we first observed the light as we said good bye to some friends, after leaving a cafe. they saw it too, but were just getting in their car to leave. we stayed and watched until we decided to get in my car and give chase. this time, i was the driver. we also got out and observed the lights. one flew towards us and then away over a hill. we attempted to follow and lost it behind the hill, only to have one passenger see it reappear right in mid air, or another just like it. it emerged again, close to where we had originally seen it. this time it followed a similar pattern and disappeared again behind the hill in the same direction, but a little farther north in location.
****
    first dec 9th sighting continued:
    we had just left petaluma and were away from the towns lights. the light was first observed by the person in the passenger's seat who pointed it out to us. distance was hard to judge in the dark, but it over the hill and coming toward the highway, maybe about 1,500 to 1,000 feet up and about 2,000 feet away. it was approaching the highway and getting slightly closer.
   something about this made it look out of the ordinary, including its movement, but nothing glaring about it said it could not be a plane at first, except there were no strobes and i assessed it was not bright enough for a landing light. planes come in to land at gnoss field but this was outside the landing pattern and coming from the  wrong direction. 
   it was off to the center right of the windshield, clearly red orange. we could see it clearly. at first it looked like a solid light. after a short time, i began to see that it seemed to glow brighter and then fade. it began pulsing. i began counting the pulses, and found they were about 1 second intervals, but a strobe flashes at this rate, not pulses. this would not go out and it got bright, then dim, bright, then dim. 
    i assessed to see if it might be a helicopter. it loved from the right slowly to the left in a way only a helicopter might, but the movement was strange. 
    it crossed our vision of the windshield to the right over the marsh. finally, i was looking out the side window to see it. i rolled down the window and braved the frigid air to have an even clearer, cleaner look at it. looked like the red lights on top of the antennae by the gnoss field municipal airport, but those are 4 antennae together, with multiple lights and only about 200 feet tall. gnoss was about 2 miles south.    the 4 antennae are together, with multiple lights all the way up them and only about 200 feet tall and this hovered at about 1,500 - 2,000 feet up.  

the light hovered over the marsh but was not still. it was moving but hard to tell how much due to the movement of our car down the highway. as we traveled on the highway, i was able to determine that it was not going anywhere, but rather maintaining itself over an area 
      confirm that it was not going anywhere, but rather maintaining itself over an area.
finally, it started moving south along side us, slowly at first, paralleling the highway and eventually began overtaking our car.
it headed out away from us. other planes were now visible in the distance and crossing at higher altitudes. it headed out over the bay, still at a low altitude. i followd it as long as i could. i lost it occasionally behind a hill behind a the hills to our right, but would regain it unlit i lost sight of it in novato.

738-1604
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering, pulsing red light seeen from highway that eventually started moving slowly, then moved fast away in the distance

content.detailedDescription: Leaving school. object observed from the parking lot and then again about a mile away when i stopped for another look.
content.summary: About 10 times the brightness of a star. saw the clouds pass behind it at one point.

content.detailedDescription: Domingo 15 de diciembre de 20013 5:40am salgo de mi casa con mi esposa e hijas. me dirig���a a llevar a mi esposa a trabajar. nos detuvimos en una luz de trancito ya eran alrededor de las 5:53 cuando me percato de  2 luces rojas estables y 2 luces blancas flachando despegando de sw ,subi��� a la altura ala que vuela una avioneta peque���a bajo las nubes, era una noche nublada. le pregunto a mi esposa que s��� ve���a eso, y ella dijo que s���, vol��� como a 2 millas o m���s desde donde despego, hacia  el norte y se detuvo como por 3 segundos y las luces cambiaron, eran 2 rojas estables y 2 verdes flachando y luego se dirigi��� sobre nosotro, saque el tel���fono y le tome un video eran las 5:55am. no me asuste ni nada tal ves porque andaba acompa���ado. luego trate de llevar a mi esposa a trabajar lomas r���pido posible para peder seguir viendo el evento tranquilo sin tener la precion de que mi esposa tiene que trabajar. recuerdo que cuando manejaba mire hacia tras y el objeto cambi��� sus luces al color que ten���a al principio. deje a mi esposa en el trabajo y volv��� a lugar de evento y el objeto ya hab���a desaparesido.               pueden ver el video en you tube (ufo in palm bay fl at palm bay rd)
content.summary: Luces rojas y verde y voló sobre nosotros tengo video y fotos era me forma de x

content.detailedDescription:
Driving that evening from tamarac, mcnab road area, to lauderhill, commercial blvd area, for dinner out. 1/2 block south of home location, passenger with me yelled out, "what the heck are those things!"...I slammed on the brakes, turned on flashers (thankfully, no one behind us!)and looked out to the east, which would be the ft. lauderdale area. i then did a u-turn at the stop sign, pulled the car over to a swale area, and we both just stared at these bright orange, glowing orb-type objects. they appeared to be ascending, individually, and in small groups/clusters, float together to a certain point, and then maintained a straight path, and then one by one disappeared, until only one was visible. we lost sight at that point, due to tree cover. there was no wind that evening, it was clear in the area we were observing, but there seemed to be some storm clouds to the northeast...We did see flashes of 'odd' lightning, as well. the orbs seemed to be traveling rather fast. they did not seem to be just floating on air currents. i attempted to take a photo, with my cellphone camera, but was unable to do so. as far as feelings/reactions...I suppose wonderment would cover it...We've been seeing a lot of odd things over the past couple of months...An earlier orb siting in november, a single one, to the northwest of our location.

i've been checking your site since sunday evening, as to whether or not any other residents noticed them...This would match with your report #52816, tamarac, also.

as an aside, we've also been noticing rather odd 'twinkling stars' of late, which i've been unable to identify as actual planets, or stars. they seem to come and go, not always in the same sky areas, and do not appear at the same time of either day or evening. they tend to appear either to the west of us, but also slightly northwest, and to the east...
content.summary: Multiple 'fireballs'/orbs observed due east of our location

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the car to do christmas shopping when i saw something that looked to be the size of an aircraft carrier or bigger i will it admit it was so far away it was hard to determine an actual size but the jets beside it looked like your average size fighter jet and all i could take from the helicopter was that it was black and flew behind it shining lights on it as we went over the hill i could no longer see it but did hear a sonic boom about five seconds later. i don't know for sure what it was but i'm sure it was not normal and unless we have large secret hovering small city's in are latest undisclosed military what i saw can not be explained. my husband saw it as well but seemed almost scared to admit what we had just saw he said our military must have been testing something.
content.summary: I saw it hovering close to bham international airport on both sides of if where jets and in front of strange black helecopter

content.detailedDescription: It was at night and it was moving as fast as a car driving down a slow street it was reflecting the full moon in great detail moving from east to north going a little up and down at times i watched it for about 15 minutes. it was moving as fast as i held up my finger in front of my eye and stood very still it was on one side of my finger and in a matter of seconds it was on the other side of my finger so that's pretty fast even for the moon i suppose. it was a little cloudy the clouds were moving in the opposite direction fast. i also saw light reflecting through the clouds in a different place and the moon moved through that patch of light. i was going to record it but i thought people would just say that's just the moon but then i realize now that the moon does not even move like that everyone claims. i seen another post just like mine "the moon" on here but i can't find it but i remember reading it.
content.summary: Was moving as fast as a car driving down a slow street it was reflecting the full moon in great detail moving from east to north going a little up and down at times i watched it for about 15 minutes. i seen another post like mine "the moon".

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for bed when i glanced out the window and saw a light in what i thought a strange place in the sky for a star or planet, that was around 9:30 pm. i watched it for a few moments and saw that it had shifted positions from where i first marked it, i then got out my binoculars and went into the back yard for a better look, sadly, they are only 10x25 and did not offer as grand a view as i would of liked. i brought it to the attention of my girlfriend and after her assessment she took out her camera, which did not offer much better resolution, and after only a few attempts at  photographing it, she gave up. through the binoculars and the bedroom window i continued to watch the lights change colors and shape. there were green and white lights at what would be the north end of it, two green side by side with the white one on top, while the middle stobe'd red, yellow, pink, blue and white. as it floated across the sky ever so slowly, the lights at the north end changed positions and began to glow bright white at the south end without the green ones, while the lights in the middle seamed to change from a concave shape on the bottom, to seemingly encompassing it around unseen edges. the lights contained within the middle of the of the object of my fascination changed many more times. in the beginning they were round and only outlined the bottom, then encompassed it wholly, in nearly a perfect circle, flashing a multitude of varying colors, leaving a dark, or, black stripe down its center, (north to south.) at last glance there were no lights at the north end and it seamed to have a "c" look to it as if it were heading south with the bright white light heading it up. as this is still happening at this moment and i have taken yet another look, the bright white lite is now on the north end, while the surrounding lights have changed from nearly horizontal, to nearly vertical. it is now 10:30 pm and the lights are still moving in a south westwardly manor at about the same pace as the other stars, which are not, flickering multi colored lights. if this is a planet who's light is flickering in the clear and cool night sky because of the atmosphere, then i have to say, i cant wait till tomorrow to see it again!
content.summary: Lights much like bioilumenesant underwater sea creature.

content.detailedDescription:
So i was outside snowmobiling and it was when i stopped to call me dog that i  realized that the ground was a dim shade of red then i looked up and there was the object (orb like) and it was as i looked, that the thing moved fast towards the west and in a matter of seconds it was gone but it left a trail. the trail was brighter then the sky kinda cloudy like a mist but soon gone.

i know i was not seeing things because when it was hovering my dog sat and looked up at it too
content.summary: Hovered above head then moved due west fast

content.detailedDescription:
Going north on a road off hwy 101 in redwood valley, ca, we noticed 2 round objects through our windshield & passenger window in the ne sky but north of the full moon, at about 7:10pm.  we pulled over, turned off the vehicle. my husband got out of the vehicle & my head was outside of the passenger window. there were no sounds like jets, helicopters, small aircraft, missiles etc. and there were no lights on these objects as aircraft have.

the 2 objects were horizontal with each other, in a line, about about 80 degrees apart. the northern-most object "zagged" a little bit back-upwards, then shot straight upward beyond the allocumulos clouds,followed by the southern-most object, which also shot straight upward and out of sight and out of sight within 2 seconds. both passed through the allocumulus clouds. we could see stars thru the clouds, but not those 2 objects.
content.summary: 2 fire-colored orbs hovered then shot straight upwards & disappeard.
